statements: SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, price FROM in_app_purchases WHERE price > 10.00;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(price) AS total_spent FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM in_app_purchases WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, product_name, ROUND(price,1) AS price_formatted, purchase_date FROM in_app_purchases WHERE user_id IN (456,789) ORDER BY purchase_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases > 1;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_in_app_purchases
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_transaction_records
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_amount FROM mobile_app_in_app_purchases
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM mobile_app_transaction_records
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_in_app_purchases WHERE status = 'completed'
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_price > 10 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM mobile_app_transaction_records GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 100 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM mobile_app_transaction_records WHERE transaction_status = 'completed'
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, purchase_price FROM mobile_app_in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_price BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY purchase_price ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM mobile_app_transaction_records GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionRecords WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, price FROM InAppPurchases WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT purchase_date, product_name FROM InAppPurchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = '1d64b9b0-7cb4-4b69-96d4-189f51a9c2f2';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM InAppPurchases ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionRecords WHERE user_id = 'ee3f9b49-12e2-4ab6-9953-d894ce4a95fb' AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_date, p.product_name FROM Users u JOIN TransactionRecords t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN InAppPurchases p ON t.purchase_id = p.id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM in_app_purchases WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transaction_records WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND transaction_type = 'Credit';
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT user_accounts.username, product_catalog.product_name, transaction_records.transaction_amount FROM user_accounts JOIN in_app_purchases ON user_accounts.user_id = in_app_purchases.user_id JOIN product_catalog ON in_app_purchases.product_id = product_catalog.product_id JOIN transaction_records ON in_app_purchases.user_id = transaction_records.user_id WHERE transaction_records.transaction_amount < 50;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_type = 'Refund' AND transaction_amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases, AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_amount FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT product_name, price, purchase_date FROM in_app_purchases WHERE price > 50;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name FROM in_app_purchases ORDER BY purchase_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_details WHERE product_name LIKE '%game%';
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2021-12-31');
SELECT product_name, price FROM in_app_purchases WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT u.username, t.transaction_date, p.product_name FROM users u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id INNER JOIN in_app_purchases p ON t.purchase_id = p.purchase_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
